https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/baT20krHmPWE5erxJgqPXIF1zvG.jpg To avenge his father's death, a circus entertainer trained in magic and acrobatics turns thief to take down a corrupt bank in Chicago. Two cops from Mumbai are assigned to the case. Dhoom 3
